select post_no , user_id , post_title , post_contents , to_char(post_uploaddate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') post_uploaddate , post_hits , post_originalfile , post_savedfile from blog_post
where post_title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR post_contents like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by post_no desc

select count(*) from blog_post
where post_title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR post_contents like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by post_no desc
select * from( select post_no , user_id , post_title , post_hits from blog_post where post_uploaddate between sysdate -30 and sysdate order by post_hits desc) where rownum <= 5
select * from( select follow_ed_id , count(follow_ed_id) as follow_ed_no from follow group by grouping sets(follow_ed_id) order by follow_ed_no desc) where rownum <= 5

select total from( select a.user_id , sum(b.user_pay_price) as total from order_list a, user_pay b where a.order_no = b.order_no and (b.user_pay_date between sysdate -365 and sysdate) group by grouping sets(a.user_id)) where user_id = #{user_id}
